description: This table stores the link between encounter ID and the associated log or case ID.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The community ID of the owner of this encounter.

columns.name: OR_LINK_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the admission linked to the procedural case/log . This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: OR_LINK_INP_ID
columns.description: The inpatient data ID used by the case and log.

columns.name: OR_SHARE_PERIOP_YN
columns.description:
Do OR management system Periop activities share data with Inpatient?


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OR_SUM_BLOCKS_ID
columns.description: The summary block record associated with this surgery.

columns.name: OR_SRC_VISIT_CSN
columns.description: This item will store the Contact Serial Number (CSN) for the visit in which this surgery was created.

columns.name: OR_CASELOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedural case/log.  NOTE: Use the CASE_ID or LOG_ID columns to link to the case or log record, respectively. This column should not be used to write reports.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time when this row was extracted into enterprise reporting.

columns.name: OR_MED_REV_HSB_ID
columns.description: The summary block record associated with the medication review workflow.  This summary block record will store all of the review history.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case (ORC) that is associated with this encounter.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log (ORL) that is associated with this encounter.

columns.name: PXPASS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Procedure Pass that is associated with this surgical encounter.
